abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention report finds while very active high school athletes use smokeless tobacco at higher rates than non-athletes they also smoke fewer cigarettes than non-athletes.
lead_paragraph: Very active high school athletes use smokeless tobacco products at higher rates than students who do not participate in sports, according to a report by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

headline.main: Smokeless Tobacco Use Found Higher Among Student-Athletes
headline.print_headline: Smokeless Tobacco Use Found Higher Among Student-Athletes

snippet: Very active high school athletes use smokeless tobacco products at higher rates than students who do not participate in sports, according to a report by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
